description: Kindergarten 2 is a puzzle game where the player repeats the same Tuesday at Kindergarten over and over, discovering items and information to help other characters complete their missions

0.1.0.description:
## Initial Release

### To Install
- Make a copy of your Kindergarten 2 game, to avoid modding your original [Optional, but recommended]
- Extract the Archipelagarten zip into your to-be-modded game It should then look like this
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3ffbf66c-28df-4562-b361-0899fe2e064d)
- Edit ArchipelagoConnectionInfo.json to the correct ip, slotname, etc.
- Run Kindergarten2.exe. It should automatically connect, or fail to do so and tell you in the console
- Your Archipelago save will take up all 3 save slots, and your original saves will be unaffacted, but **inaccessible as long as you remain modded** (This is why making a copy of the original, to have a vanilla game available, was recommended).

You can play multiple games at once with only one installation, as the Archipelago save files will remain, yet be hidden, when connecting to a different multiworld.

The exception is an exact copy of the same multiworld (same multiword seed, and same slot seed), as they will conflict their save files.
Even then, the game state is almost entirely decided dynamically, from the server, so a conflicting save file should not cause problems
0.1.0.title: Archipelagarten 0.1.0

1.1.1.description: - Kinda initial release, fixed some minor bugs from pre-release, and also added some deathlinks
1.1.1.title: Archipelagarten 2 Release 1.1.1

1.1.2.description: - Allow receiving monstermon cards with wrong case names
1.1.2.title: Archipelagarten 2 Release 1.1.2

1.1.3.description:
## Apworld
- Fixed a logic error where the player was expected to be able to grab the cafeteria nuggets when the Lunch Lady is cooking something vegan. Turns out you **can** grab them, but then you die
1.1.3.title: Archipelagarten 2 Release 1.1.3
